channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [CRIZAC] Crizac Ltd Announces Q3 Results, Interim Dividend, and Approves Employee Stock Option Plan
item.description:
Crizac Ltd has announced its unaudited financial results for the third quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The company has reported a profit and has declared an interim dividend of Rs. 8.00 per share. The Board has also approved the ratification of the Amended and Restated Crizac Employee Stock Option Plan 2026 and the grant of options to employees of subsidiary/associate companies under the plan. The record date for the dividend is February 4, 2026, and the payment will be completed by February 26, 2026.

  • Unaudited financial results for Q3 and nine months ended December 31, 2025, approved
  • Interim dividend of Rs. 8.00 per share declared
  • Record date for dividend payment set as February 4, 2026
  • Amended and Restated Crizac Employee Stock Option Plan 2026 ratified
  • Options to be granted to employees of subsidiary/associate companies under the plan

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Crizac Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [SUNLOC] Sunil Healthcare Ltd to Approve Q3 Financial Results on Feb 06, 2026
item.description:
Sunil Healthcare Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 06, 2026, to consider and approve the un-audited financial results for the quarter ended on December 31, 2025. The meeting will be held through video conferencing/audio visual connection as per SEBI regulations. The trading window will be closed from January 01, 2026, to February 08, 2026, under the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015.

  • Sunil Healthcare Ltd to consider and approve Q3 financial results on Feb 06, 2026
  • Meeting to be held through video conferencing as per SEBI regulations
  • Trading window to be closed from Jan 01, 2026, to Feb 08, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Sunil Healthcare Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [WARRENTEA] Warren Tea Ltd. to Approve Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 and Nine Months Ended 31st December, 2025 on 10th February, 2026
item.description:
Warren Tea Ltd. has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on 10th February, 2026 to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the third quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2025. The meeting will take place at Johar Building, P-1, Hide Lane, 8th Floor, Kolkata 700 073 at 12.30 PM. The trading window for purchase/sale/dealing in the company's shares by designated persons will remain closed from 1st January, 2026 till 12th February, 2026 in compliance with the Insider Trading Code adopted by the company pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulation, 2015.

  • Warren Tea Ltd. to approve unaudited financial results for Q3 and nine months ended 31st December, 2025 on 10th February, 2026
  • The trading window for purchase/sale/dealing in the company's shares by designated persons will remain closed from 1st January, 2026 till 12th February, 2026

item.title: [RISHILASE] Rishi Laser Ltd: No New Requests for Physical Shares Transfer in December 2025 - January 2026
item.description:
Rishi Laser Ltd has shared a report from the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent, Adroit Corporate Services Private Limited, regarding the re-lodgement of transfer requests of physical shares for the period December 2025 to January 2026. The report indicates that there were no new requests or processed requests during this period, as per the SEBI circular no. SEBI/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD-PoD/P/CIR/2025/97 dated 2â„¢ July 2025. This special window was opened for a period of six months from 07* July, 2025 till 06\

item.description:

item.title: [CARTRADE] CarTrade Tech Ltd Approves Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results for 2025 and Postal Ballot for Increased Remuneration
item.description:
CarTrade Tech Ltd, a leading Indian company, has approved its unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the third quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025. The company's Board of Directors also approved a postal ballot notice to consider and approve an increase in remuneration of Mrs. Aneesha Bhandary, Executive Director and CFO. The financial results show the company's performance in various areas, including revenue, expenses, and profitability.

  • Approval of unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for Q3 and nine months ended on December 31, 2025
  • Increase in remuneration of Mrs. Aneesha Bhandary, Executive Director and CFO approved
  • Revenue from operations, other income, and total income reported
  • Employee benefit expense, finance cost, depreciation and amortization expense, and other expenses incurred
  • Profit before exceptional item and tax, exceptional item, profit before tax, and tax expenses calculated

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: CarTrade Tech Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.description:
Pearl Global Industries Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 06, 2026, to consider and approve the Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and period ended December 31, 2025. This is in accordance with the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

  • The meeting is scheduled for February 06, 2026

item.title: [CARTRADE] CarTrade Tech Hits Record Q3 Revenue of 228 crores and EBITDA zooms by 56% to 78 crores
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

CarTrade Tech Limited, a leading digital marketplace ecosystem in India, announced its financial results for the quarter ended December 31st, 2025. The company reported its highest-ever quarterly revenue of 2228.37 crores, representing a 18% YoY growth. EBITDA grew 56% to 278.25 crores and Profit After Tax (PAT) of 361.52 crores, up 35% YoY. EBITDA Margins reached an all-time high of 37% in the quarter. The company operates across more than 500 physical locations and its digital platforms cater to over 150 million annual unique visitors.

  • Q3FY26 revenue at a record 2228.37 crores, up 18% YoY
  • EBITDA for Q3FY26 at 278.25 crores, up 56% YoY
  • Profit After Tax (PAT) for Q3FY26 at 361.52 crores, up 35% YoY
  • EBITDA margins reached an all-time high of 37%
  • Company operates across more than 500 physical locations

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: CarTrade Tech Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [JAICORPLTD] Jai Corp Ltd Schedules Board Meeting to Approve Q4 and Annual Results for 2025
item.description:
Jai Corp Ltd has announced a board meeting scheduled for 13th February 2026 to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and period ended 31st December 2025. The trading window for the company's shares, which commenced on 15th January 2026, will close 48 hours after the financial results are declared, in accordance with the Company's Code of Conduct and SEBI regulations.

  • Jai Corp Ltd has scheduled a board meeting for 13th February 2026 to approve Q4 and annual results for 2025.
  • The meeting will consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and period ended 31st December 2025.
  • The trading window for the company's shares, which commenced on 15th January 2026, will close 48 hours after the financial results are declared.

item.title: [JENBURPH*] Jenburkt Pharmaceuticals Ltd to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results on Feb 3, 2026
item.description:
Jenburkt Pharmaceuticals Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 3, 2026, to consider and approve the standalone unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025. This meeting is pursuant to the company's earlier communication dated December 15, 2025.

  • Jenburkt Pharmaceuticals Ltd is set to approve its Q3 and nine months financial results for the period ending on December 31, 2025.
  • The Board of Directors will meet on February 3, 2026, at the company's registered office to discuss the standalone unaudited financial results.
  • This meeting is a follow-up to the company's earlier communication dated December 15, 2025.
  • The financial results to be discussed are for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025.
